about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Get to Know Me
description: Software Developer specializing in React and Next.js, with a focus on building scalable, user-friendly applications. Skilled in performance optimization, troubleshooting, and intuitive design.
Adept at bridging technical and business needs to deliver high-quality, innovative solutions. Experienced in agile methodologies and collaborative cross-functional team environments.
